summary: This will give you a ton of new scars for humans and elves.
descriptionHtml:
I have made in Photoshop an extra 40+ set of new scar shapes that you all may like.

You don't have to have the Race Menu mod for this. I already have that mod when I made screenshots so don't worry about that.

I even included the left side and right side of the face. There are up to 115 combination of new scars at the Character Creation menu for male and females. I have included a Skyrim symbol that is made like someone had taken a branding iron with the symbol to burn into the face.

These scars are for humans and elves. Here soon I will upload some more for the beasts.

Right now I'm brainstorming on more scar art.

UPDATE: 12/23/2013 - New optional file has been uploaded. No more shiny textures. Textures match skin now.

UPDATE: 12/31/2013- I have now included ritual scars, joker smile, and cracked scars the ones you see from Darth Scion Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic Sith Lords.

UPDATE: 12/31/2013- I also changed the name to Diverse Scars for the new scars to be different from each other.

If you want to make these into high definition go ahead.

If you have any suggestions for new scars let me know.

Coming soon: Blood scars and more stitches.

To install just use the Nexus Mod Manager.

Credits: Bethesda Softworks

Thank you Bethesda for creating an awesome game and providing the beautiful ability to allow us to mod your games.
author: Valus34
